message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%, but I'm open to negotiation.
Alice, your starting offer was a bit steep. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  It's a good deal considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up more than 50% of the money. Let's split it 55/45, with you getting the larger share. We can work this out.
Okay Alice, I see you're willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle and make it 55/45 in my favor? That's my final offer.
